item.description:
http://www.kocateringandpies.com/

I just talked to Sam and his plan is to provide some mini pies and sausage rolls and other Aussie snacks for us, as well as a selection of Australian beer and wine.  We will be charging a small entry fee to cover costs: $10 for drinkers, $5 for non drinkers.  After we leave the shop around 10pm we'll head down to Lucky's Lounge (355 Congress Street, Boston) for some live music. Shaping up to be a great night, looking forward to it.

http://www.luckyslounge.com/
item.why: Sam from KO Catering and Pies has kindly offered to host this meetup event in his shop. Come and relax on a Friday evening after work and enjoy some Aussie food and a few cold beers. After 10pm we'll move closer to the city and continue the fun.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: KO Friday
